thread.title: BRIEF-Nextera Energy And Jinkosolar Announce Deal For Millions Of Solar Panels

title: BRIEF-Nextera Energy And Jinkosolar Announce Deal For Millions Of Solar Panels
text:
March 30, 2018 / 2:23 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Nextera Energy And Jinkosolar Announce Deal For Millions Of Solar Panels   Nextera Energy 
* NEXTERA ENERGY AND JINKOSOLAR ANNOUNCE DEAL FOR MILLIONS OF SOLAR PANELS; JINKOSOLAR TO BEGIN MANUFACTURING SOLAR PANELS IN FLORIDA 
* NEXTERA ENERGY INC SAYS ‍THAT IT IS COUNTERPARTY TO A MAJOR SUPPLY AGREEMENT THAT WAS ANNOUNCED BY JINKOSOLAR IN JANUARY​ 
* NEXTERA ENERGY INC - ‍COMPANIES AMENDED AGREEMENT THIS MONTH, AND JINKOSOLAR WILL SUPPLY NEXTERA ENERGY WITH UP TO 2,750 MEGAWATTS OF SOLAR MODULES​ 
* NEXTERA ENERGY INC - ‍IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE AGREEMENT, JINKOSOLAR IS OPENING ITS FIRST U.S. FACTORY IN JACKSONVILLE, FLORIDA​ Source text for Eikon:
